name: Rumple Town
description:
Welcome to Rumple Town!

Get ready for a turn based, card drafting adventure. Use your deck building and tactical skills to draft a deck that is strong enough to best the oncoming monsters.

Each card can be upgraded twice.

Summon Totems during combat, which will give you all sorts of benefits.



Learn different card synergies, which will help you defeat the toughest of monsters.

You will collect constructs in your adventure which you will keep from battle to battle.

After surviving through each year, the monsters will become stronger, but new mechanics will be introduced.
